title: St Andrews
name: St Andrews Castle
price: £4.50 (''Child £2.00, Concessions £3.50, joint Castle & Cathedral ticket available'')
content: St Andrews Castle, built in approximately 1400, is where the Bishops of St Andrews lived before the Reformation. It has also served as a fortress and even a prison, but fell into ruin in the 17th century. It has a beautiful location next to the sea. See and explore the mine and counter-mine built under the Castle during a siege in the 1540s.
